definition: To eliminate or take away something from a particular location or position, often referring to physical objects or substances. It is commonly used when discussing the act of removing or getting rid of something, such as objects, stains, or unwanted substances.

examples.german: Der Fleck lässt sich nicht entfernen.
Die Polizei entfernte die Demonstranten gewaltsam.
examples.english: The police forcibly removed the protesters.

examples.german: Entfernen Sie den Deckel, um den Behälter zu öffnen.
examples.english: Remove the lid to open the container.
